title: Living the Cross-Centered Life
speaker: Matt McCullough
blurb: As Jesus makes his way towards Jerusalem and the death that’s waiting there for him, he narrows his focus to teaching his disciples what it means to follow a Messiah who suffers. The cross sets the pattern for Christian discipleship, and this text offers concrete examples. A life modeled on the cross is a life that puts the interests of others above its own, and it’s a life that fights a radical battle with sin.
